name: ASOCIACIÓN DE NAVIEROS ESPAÑOLES - SPANISH SHIPOWNERS ASSOCIATION
goal:
ANAVE is a business organisation of national scope, constituted for the coordination, representation, management, promotion and defense of the Spanish shipping companies' interests.

Founded in 1977, it has its origins in a preceding organisation, OFICEMA, established in 1951.

President: Mr. Alejandro Aznar
Director: Mr. Manuel Carlier

To fulfil its task, ANAVE:
• Keep relationships with the Spanish and European Union Administrations and Institutions.
• Participates in Associations and Organisations of national and international character.
• Produces reports and studies of technical, economical and educational nature.
• Organises meetings, seminars, technical courses, etc.
interests: Climate Action, Competition, Employment and Social Affairs, Environment, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives:
Green House Gases Emissions - Monitoring, reporting and verification shipping CO2 emmissions
Air pollutant emissions from ships
